reference.title: Connect : To connect CAN controller to CAN bus

section.title: Description
section.p: This function will connect the tool to CAN bus. The return value of this function will be 0 or 1. This function can return 0 in case tool is already connected. dwClientId is reserved for future use.

section.title: Returns
section.p: A value zero indicate failure condition while a value 1 indicate a success condition.
